originalText.text: They were simply the best from start to done all the process . I started my marriage process with them in August ,  and within a few months my green card was approved without an interview. During the entire process they were completely attentive to me, making me more comfortable during this waiting time. It is worth highlighting how Leandro was patient with all my anxiety about the result. I am one hundred percent satisfied and happy.

originalText.text: Prisma was by far, the best part about my naturalization process.  They really took their time going over everything They needed from me and were very prompt to give me all the information and assistance that I needed.  Their professionalism was beyond anything I expected and I got my citizenship right when they advised me I would.  I definitely would recommend their service as I believe everyone should have an easy  and understanding process as I had.

originalText.text: The Prisma team was fantastic! I was so nervous about my green card process, but they guided me through every step of the way and made the entire experience stress-free. They were very knowledgeable, professional, and answered all of my questions with ease. I highly recommend them to anyone who needs help with their immigration process.

text.text: The Prisma team was fantastic! I was so nervous about my green card process, but they guided me through every step of the way and made the entire experience stress-free. They were very knowledgeable, professional, and answered all of my questions with ease. I highly recommend them to anyone who needs help with their immigration process.

originalText.text: PRISMA Digital Immigration made my process smooth and successful. I am grateful for trusting them, especially Leandro Krauss, whose expertise, confidence, and best advice got me my documents in time record (SS, Travel Document, and work permit). He also helped me getting my permanent residency. I highly recommend them. THANK YOU so much!
